xmlText.p: First Period_1, Vancouver, Eriksson 9 (Edler, D.Sedin), 2:00. 2, Vancouver, D.Sedin 15 (Vanek, H.Sedin), 10:54. 3, Vancouver, Horvat 15 (Stecher, Nilsson), 11:50. 4, Vancouver, Baertschi 13, 18:39. Penalties_Pouliot, VAN, (tripping), 6:13.
